name: Runner Dumbs
description:
Concept :  Boars appared in a spawning point and you has some spells you can use in the bottom with your mouse.

Fire makes you jump.

Ice cube : makes you slow

Green :  spawning point

Objective : you need to go From an A to B point and a suffisciant  number of characters needed to access to the exit . (Lemmings-like)

Made by : 

- Coffee Bat (Programmation, 2D art) https://benjaminno.itch.io/

- Sealed (2D art, UI)

- Lehomar2vinci (Sound Design) https://lehomar2vinci.itch.io/

For the moment, it's a prototype or a toy as you prefer !

Dev TBA
